pages.name: Ritual of the Crusher
pages.text: Use a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_diviner#dusk)Ritual Diviner [Dusk]$(/l) for easier construction.

Breaks blocks within its $(item)Crushing Range$() and places the items into the linked $(item)Chest$().$(br2)$(air)Air Runes: 4$(br)$(fire)Fire Runes: 4$(br)$(earth)Earth Runes: 4$(br)$()Dusk Runes: 4$(br2)$()Total Runes: 16

pages.title: Raw
pages.text: Increases the speed of the ritual based on the total amount of $(raw)Raw Will$() in the Aura.

pages.title: Corrosive
pages.text: All blocks are broken to be processed with a form of $(l:bloodmagic:utility/alchemy_table#cutting_fluid)Cutting Fluid$(). Overrides $(item)Silk Touch$() where applicable.

pages.title: Vengeful
pages.text: Compresses the inventory on successful operation (e.g. coal into Coal Blocks, Redstone into Blocks of Redstone, etc). Currently only does one compression per operation.

pages.title: Destructive
pages.text: Blocks are broken down forcefully: all blocks broken are affected by $(item)Fortune III.$()

pages.title: Steadfast
pages.text: Causes all blocks that are broken to be picked up with $(item)Silk Touch$(). Overrides $(item)Fortune$() where applicable.

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Chest) The location of the inventory that the ritual will place the broken blocks into. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: 1 $(li)Horizontal Radius: 3 $(li)Vertical Radius: 3

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Crushing) The blocks that the ritual will break. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: 50 $(li)Horizontal Radius: 10 $(li)Vertical Radius: 10
